name: fabrico-cli
author: Code Architects
description: A command-line seed app built with TypeScript and Node.js.

scripts.clean: npm run clean.artifacts && npm run clean.node_modules
scripts.build.test: npm run clean.artifacts && tsc -p tsconfig.debug.json --outDir dist
scripts.test: nyc -e .ts -x bin -x lib/**/*.spec.ts mocha -r ts-node/register lib/**/*.spec.ts
scripts.wkb: cd ../fabrico && npm run build && cd ../fabrico-cli && npm run build
scripts.wkbt: cd ../fabrico && npm run build && cd ../fabrico-cli && npm run build.test
scripts.wkfbt: cd ../fabrico && npm run build.test && npm run build &&  && cd ../fabrico-cli && npm run build.test
scripts.wktest: cd ../fabrico && npm run build.test && npm run test && npm run build && npm run link && cd ../fabrico-cli && npm run build.test && npm run test
